nithi wirodhi danwim, katawut, banar, postar, dhaja pathaka, stikar pradarshanaya kirim, nithi wirodhi lesa bhanda bedadim, nithi wirodhi mathiwarana karyala pawathwagena yama, rajya niladharin deshapalana paksha ho pudgalayin prawardhanaya kirima wenuwen katayuthu kirima, nithi wirodhi aakarayata sanwardhana katayuthu deshapalana paksha ho pudgalayin prawardhanaya kirima wenuwen yoda ganima saha maha marga aashrithawa deshapalana lanchana salakunu kirima aadi nithi wirodhi kriya rasak pilibandawa paminili labi thibe.

in pasu hadisiyema karishma siya lama wiye sitama mithuraku wu dilli wyaparika sanje kapur samanga uthkarshawath mangalyayakin yuga jiwithaya arambauwe dahasak balaporoththu athiwayi. 2003 wasare boliwudaye supiri mangalyayak lesin thawamath me mangalyaya boho denakuge mathakaye pawathi.prasiddhiye karishma kisiwak heli nokalath thathu danno pawasuwe wiwaha wu dinaye patanma karishma sathutin jiwath nowu bawayi. 2005 di sameyira diyaniya ipadima biendamin pawathunu wiwahayata bandimak athi kalath, eya da tika kalayakata wiya.
